title: Beacon node KILLED. Already 3 days.
body:
[2020-02-05 20:12:56] ERROR sync: Failed to handle p2p pubsub error=block from slot 192882 is not a descendent of the current finalized block slot 192896,  != 0xbb4b6c7eba19
could not process block from fork choice service
github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/beacon-chain/blockchain.(*Service).ReceiveBlockNoPubsub
	beacon-chain/blockchain/receive_block.go:74
github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/beacon-chain/sync.(*Service).beaconBlockSubscriber
	beacon-chain/sync/subscriber_beacon_blocks.go:51
github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/beacon-chain/sync.(*Service).subscribeWithBase.func1
	beacon-chain/sync/subscriber.go:147
runtime.goexit
	GOROOT/src/runtime/asm_amd64.s:1357 topic=/eth2/beacon_block/ssz
[2020-02-05 20:12:58]  INFO sync: Requesting parent block currentSlot=192964 parentRoot=bb590b45d4a910bb7e7134edc57f82f54f4ac3bf89f4cf8b1f512167131c138b
[2020-02-05 20:13:00]  WARN blockchain: Calculated head diffs from new block blkRoot=765ef3596277403549e7b54b99b1b94bda7af974bd525e1234c2b7d3cdab95e9 blkSlot=192950 headRoot=fee483c531be5549faccc4877e5c6e01f21f80ebe89d7b6776423e99f4ddebe0 headSlot=192961
[2020-02-05 20:13:00]  INFO blockchain: Finished applying state transition attestations=98 deposits=0 slot=192950
[2020-02-05 20:13:02]  INFO sync: Requesting parent block currentSlot=192964 parentRoot=bb590b45d4a910bb7e7134edc57f82f54f4ac3bf89f4cf8b1f512167131c138b
[2020-02-05 20:13:03]  INFO forkchoice: Executing state transition on block root=0x2e287839... slot=192953
[2020-02-05 20:13:07]  WARN blockchain: Calculated head diffs from new block blkRoot=7e273338ad1f66272c2912ebec55f8806be77034c28155e55d0c24c694d12ca7 blkSlot=192906 headRoot=bb4b6c7eba195800473d75c6bdf151cbe4a4fbfd7dc6e3a11bf870bf032d9687 headSlot=192896
[2020-02-05 20:13:07]  INFO blockchain: Finished applying state transition attestations=21 deposits=0 slot=192906
Killed

I did the beacon node from the beginning. Reboot server. Again a problem:





[2020-02-07 20:56:58]  INFO forkchoice: Executing state transition on block root=0xa253312e... slot=207563
[2020-02-07 20:56:59]  INFO blockchain: Finished applying state transition attestations=47 deposits=0 slot=207536
[2020-02-07 20:57:02]  INFO blockchain: Finished applying state transition attestations=49 deposits=0 slot=207511
[2020-02-07 20:57:06]  INFO forkchoice: Executing state transition on block root=0x6dbb31b2... slot=207552

[2020-02-07 20:57:11]  INFO forkchoice: Executing state transition on block root=0x17bbfa8f... slot=207554

[2020-02-07 20:57:33]  INFO p2p: Peer disconnected active=29 peer=16Uiu2HAm3X6vz8waA1U7XMaMvgJrhzSizboHyg5xtUGmkEJdZQSs
Killed

Hey @Gsuslu what specs are you running this on? Can you hop on our discord server and chat about it? https://discord.gg/x6SRFB8 we believe the `Killed ` message happens when you run on very weak hardware such as raspberry pi's with SD cards that cannot handle the beacon node process.
